about.title: Socioscope
about.content:
Socioscope is a collaboration between the National Centre for Social Research and the Institute of Information Systems of ATHENA Research Center. It is a platform for the visualization and mapping of social and political data. Its major aim is to support social research and disseminate open social data to the general public. The data are categorized in thematic areas and are open for use under permission http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/.

It was initially developed for the project “Dynamic Management of Social Databases and Cartographic Representations - SoDaMap” (KRIPIS) (funding: GSRT, NSRF 2013-2015) and the first version can be found here. It was redesigned for the project "Research, Education and Infrastructures: the triangulation of EKKE strategic axes (REDI)", WP5: "Youth Print Web Platform (YouWeP)" (funding: GSRT, NSRF 2014-2020).

cookie.message: Socioscope uses cookies in order to function properly. Cookies are small pieces of data that websites store in your browser to allow us to give you the best browsing experience possible. By using the Socioscope portal you accept our use of cookies.
